actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide mitigation for Rocky Mountain Elk habitat lost as a result of construction of the Dworshak Dam and Reservoir on the North Fork of the Clearwater River within the State of Idaho.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, upon the execution of a land exchange between the Secretary of Agriculture and the State of Idaho, to administer the lands received in exchange as part of the Dworshak Dam and Reservoir project to mitigate the loss of the Rocky Mountain Elk habitat resulting from the construction of the project.

titles.title: A bill to provide mitigation for Rocky Mountain Elk habitat lost as a result of construction of the Dworshak Dam and Reservoir on the North Fork of the Clearwater River within the State of Idaho.
